UPDATE tbl_servicio_srvc SET srvc_estado = 'C' WHERE srvc_estado IN ('I') AND srvc_tpsr_pk = portico.getEntidad('MANIFIESTO') AND srvc_pk = #{id}
UPDATE tbl_servicio_srvc SET srvc_estado = 'I' WHERE srvc_estado IN ('C', 'B') AND srvc_tpsr_pk = portico.getEntidad('MANIFIESTO') AND srvc_pk = #{id}
UPDATE tbl_servicio_srvc SET srvc_estado = 'A' WHERE srvc_estado IN ('S', 'I', 'C') AND srvc_tpsr_pk = portico.getEntidad('MANIFIESTO') AND srvc_pk = #{id}

UPDATE tbl_servicio_srvc SET srvc_estado = ( WITH sql AS ( SELECT ssrv_estado FROM tbl_subservicio_ssrv WHERE ssrv_srvc_pk = srvc_pk AND ssrv_tpss_pk = portico.getEntidad('BL') ) SELECT CASE WHEN 'B' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) THEN 'B'
WHEN 'C' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) and not exists (SELECT 1 FROM sql WHERE ssrv_estado NOT IN ('C', 'A') ) THEN 'C'
WHEN 'I' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) AND NOT 'B' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) THEN 'I'
WHEN 'S' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) and not exists (SELECT 1 FROM sql WHERE ssrv_estado NOT IN ('S', 'A') ) THEN 'S'
WHEN 'A' = ALL (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) THEN 'A'
ELSE 'X' END ) WHERE srvc_tpsr_pk = portico.getEntidad('MANIFIESTO') AND srvc_pk = #{id}
